It rely modular , contextual , embedded approach treatment . It compare Mount Sinai 's currently operate day treatment program . The 26-week program run concurrently potential participant randomly assign Executive Plus standard program , use roll admission . Program staff separate . Outcomes assess use measure focus function within cognitive domain , across domain everyday life , assess long-term outcome . Detailed manual develop guide implementation program 's operation .
